runs.comm: goodish length on the off, a bit of inward movement there, Warner punches it back to the bowler, somewhat mistimed
ooh, that kept low and Warner was a touch fortunate there, couldn't get his bat down in time, got an under edge on the bounce to the keeper
short of a good length outside off, tries to punch that through extra cover, got a thick inside edge and Morne Morkel does well diving to his right at short fine, keeps them to a single
ooh, beaten, short of a good length and darts away as he rocks forward to defend, just goes past the outside edge
drops that short on the off and that is knocked down towards point from the crease
gets forward and across a hint there and pushes it wide of mid-on for a single, on target was Steyn
goodish length this time, defended with ease from the crease towards cover
shortish on the off, waits for it to come on and defends it towards point
in the channel outside off but slightly short, that's been guided down to third man for a single
beats Warner as well, lands slightly short on the off and gets it to nip away, Warner pushes from the crease but it just escapes the outside edge
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and presents the full face as he defends
short of a good length, opens the face and crunches it towards point where the fielder dives but can't prevent them from taking two
goodish length on the off, a bit of an inside edge from Watson as he tries to hit through the line
shortish on the off, crunches it into the ground to play it over point but just a single on offer there
short of a good length, punches it wide of mid-off for a single
again short of a good length on off and middle, gets forward and defends it wide of midwicket for a single, steady going this
there is protection in the deep, holds it back this time, pulled from outside off towards deep midwicket for a single
drops that one short outside off, a touch too short that and the umpire isn't going to spare that one, called a wide
beaten as he goes for a drive, not quite there though to hit, around a good length and he rocks forward, but not to the pitch, to drive it through cover, it nips away to beat him

Gets him! Warner goes, Warner, keen to attack after a quiet first three overs, made some room to go over the top, landed slightly short of a good length on leg and middle, he was aiming to go over extra cover, appeared to get a thin edge but straight onto the stumps, South Africa have struck early
drops that short on middle and off, rocks back and knocks that one down into the off side
down the leg side this time and he appeals in vain, Hussey tried to glance that down but made no contact, the umpire calls it a wide
on leg and middle, off the mark with a knock in front of mid-off, quick single, fuller than usual from Morkel
calmly guided down to third man for a single, just a bit of width from Morkel and was a little short as well
fullish again but on leg stump and Hussey has no trouble just dropping it in front of mid-on and stealing another single
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and pushes it to mid-on for a single, nicely done
and Kallis is thrashed first ball, short, he's not as pacy as Steyn and there was also some width, Watson smacks that between point and cover, doesn't waste that
faint appeal for lbw, shortish outside leg stump and Watson tried to help it on its way fine but missed, may just have flicked his shirt sleeve, but the umpire reckoned that was a wide
another single, this time it's pushed in front of mid-on for one more
slower one from Kallis, lands on a length outside off and it's pushed straight to extra cover where there's a fumble that allows them another single
uppish but just short of midwicket, angling in towards middle and it's flicked towards midwicket but lands safe
short of a good length at 127.1 kmph, punched back towards the bowler
shortish on middle, whipped wide of midwicket into the deep to keep the strike
and he errs in length this time, short and wide, much like Kallis in the previous over and Watson makes it two in two, there's plenty of width for him to blaze that through point
shot, pitched up on the off, he's forward, to the pitch and stylishly drives that past a diving extra cover, wide of mid-off, for a boundary
width again, this time it's cut down towards third man for a single
straying on leg and Hussey was looking to clip it into the leg side, gets a leg-bye in front of square leg
bad ball from Morkel, a full toss, and worse, it's on the pads, flicked away with ease past short fine leg, easy pickings
another one on the pads, full on middle and leg and that was flicked too, but towards a deep square leg this time, so just the single
a bit of air on that one, holds it back a little though, shortish on middle, knocked away behind square for a single
tossed up on the off stump and that's been driven straight to extra cover
flighted outside off and that's driven sweetly, through extra cover and wide of long-off for three runs, Parnell runs across and slides
turns in from outside off, gets outside the line to defend it into the leg side
seizes the length early there, rocked back upon release and dealt with it, short and it's pulled away hard over midwicket for a one bounce four
Botha's turn to slide the ball down the leg side this time, called a wide
slightly flat this time on the pads, worked wide of short fine for a quick single

big appeal for lbw, looked close, that went on straight it seemed, angling in towards middle and leg, no turn there, would it have gone down leg? Hmm, tough to say, Watson missed as he came forward to defend, looked mighty close
Watson's put that behind him in no time, short and he's rocked back to punish that over midwicket
shortish, punched hard off the back foot towards extra cover, a fumble allows them a sinlge
Hussey's doing it well, drives it down to long-on for a single, eight in eight for him now
some strength from Watson, converted that into a full toss with a reach forward, tossed up, he leaned forward and just chipped it hard over the deep midwicket boundary
floating it on the off stump, gets to the pitch and pushes that gently towards cover
Hussey charges out, tossed up from Botha, comes down the track and slices that over extra cover for a couple in the deep
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it but can't get it past midwicket
flat on the off and it's pushed straight to extra cover, quicker through the air from round the wicket
shortish on the off, eased through to deep cover for one more
shortish and it appeared to keep a little low, punched back to the bowler
flighted outside leg and he goes for the sweep, tries to sweep it fine, misses but it's called a wide, that spun down

superb fielding from JP Duminy, he was running to his right from deep midwicket, for a moment it seemed Watson had bisected that gap between Duminy and deep square leg but JP threw himself to his right, and in the end managed to keep them down to just a single, should have been for in Watson's mind
on a length first up outside off, driven uppishly towards long-off for a single
Hussey pulls and just manages to clear mid-on, came onto him a touch too quickly, lands safe and it's another single
that's been hammered, he's been superb at spotting these short ones quick, pulls that high and handsome and long, over deep square leg, raises another half-century, some form he's in
low full toss outside off, mistimes a drive to long-off for a single
a bit of a leading edge of sorts from Hussey as he tried to turn that into the leg side, ends up popping into the off side
Hussey again survives a mistimed hit, short on the off and he goes for the pull, doesn't get the distance he desires, lands safe, between the converging long-on and deep midwicket, two more

dropped, how costly will that prove? Watson reached forward to that flighted ball from Peterson, Parnell's running in from long-off, slides and it's dying on him, just manages to get his hands underneath it but can't hold on, a tough chance, but a chance nevertheless
knocks it away for a single
Hussey plays the reverse-sweep and connects well but straight to Amla at point
floating it on leg stump and that's clipped towards deep square leg for a single
tossed up on middle, drives it down to long-on past the diving bowler for a single
flat on the off, keeps a little low, punched towards extra cover
lands on a good length, that's driven towards long-off for a single
yorker length outside off, manages to dig that out towards the bowler
Hussey connects well, finally, picked the length early and dispatched it into that gap between long-on and deep midwicket
this has been sent over deep square leg and it hits a policeman standing there after rebounding from the scoreboard, on the pads and that's picked up beautifully
shortish on the off, punches that towards deep cover for a single
yorker length and that's been dug out in front of cover for a quick single
comes round the wicket to Watson, a full toss on the pads, low, and it's flicked to deep square leg for a single
tossed up on the off, that's been driven down to long-on for a single
flat on the off and that's been struck off the back foot to long-on for a single
flat on middle and off, gets forward and it's defended back to the bowler
flighted, slowed it up, Hussey came down the track to chip it into the leg side, struck on the pads and it rolls into the off side
flatter and it's struck flat towards extra cover, a single as the fielder fails to stop it clean
flighted on the leg stump from round the wicket to the left-hander, was looking to sweep it square but ended up playing it finer, just the single
flighted on middle, Watson waited for it, got to the pitch and lofted it over the bowler's head for a one bounce four, went dead straight
four more, that's struck flat and hard through extra cover, Behardiem runs to his left from long-off, slides, and then misfields, palming it past the ropes
almost three in a row, drives that over midwicket but good relay-fielding at long-on where Parnell slides to his right and saves a couple of runs
this time he holes out, wanted to finish it off in a hurry, tossed up from Peterson and Watson lofts that but doesn't get the distance, straight down long-on's throat, Parnell takes an easy catch
short of a good length, bowled flat outside off, defended back to the bowler
Hussey attacks first up, short of a good length and he shapes up for a cut and he manages to get it past point and to the ropes, slashed hard at that one
slower one bowled full outside off and AB fumbles after Hussey leaves it alone
full toss and there was some outswing, Cameron White tried to defend it from the crease and it took the outside edge as it swung away, went past slip for a boundary
Well done AB, short of a good length, White tried to guide that to third man, got an inside edge and Ab flung himself to his left to snap that, saved four runs
pitched on a length on the off and that's been defended straight to extra cover
goodish length, on target and White chooses the defend that cautiously towards extra cover
not quite to the pitch as he came down the track but managed to just nudge it into the off side for a single
shortish, and flat, outside off, defended off the back foot towards extra cover
had shaped up for a slog-sweep but got this much squarer, a single to deep square leg
tossed up on the off stump, reverse-sweeps that towards short third for a quick single
shortish on the off, knocks it back towards the bowler from the crease
misfield by Parnell in the deep, short and White drags it from outside off towards long-on, a pull, Parnell messes it up there, conceding a boundary when there should have been just one run
reaches forward and then decides to sweep it square for a single
floating it on the off, comes down the track and drives it past long-on for a single
missed stumping, kept really low, Hussey came down the track to pull it over midwicket and most would have missed it, almost went along the ground and AB couldn't collect after Hussey gave the charge
there was a bit more air on this time and Hussey connected well, tossed up and he came forward to swing that high over wide long-on for a six
pushed past extra cover for a single
Mid-on is inside the circle and White goes over the top this time, tossed up on middle and he clears the circle with ease
fires it flat on middle from round the wicket, turns it wide of square leg for a single
shortish on the off, gets across and works it away behind square for a single
shortish on the off, gets back and works it through midwicket for a single
White finishes it off in style, a flat six swung away over deep square leg, had made up his mind there and connected well enough to clear the ropes by a distance
